question: At night when we sleep with our wife can i touch her private parts,
answer:
QUESTION
At night when we sleep with our wife can i touch her private parts, even tho i am not sleeping but she is sleeping and she dont know anything? And what part can i touch of my wife, and what part can she touch of ours?
ANSWER


Share:
In principle, husband and wife may take benefit of each other from any part of the body. The husband and wife may touch the private parts of each other.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
